attributes.additional_details:
We call for the Building Regulations that effect the Plumbing & Heating industry to be reviewed but led by installers, the current Regulations are not in line with new technologies and are out of line with the rest of Western Europe and in our opinion will restrict the UK from reaching its CO reduction targets, we need to embrace new technology and allow installers the freedom to use these technologies within the Building Regulations.

The Government need to listen to installers, we are the knowledge base and we see lots of restrictions in our trade that prevent us from installing high quality efficient heating and plumbing systems.
